title: 政府工officer grade 筆試 (英文篇),歡迎大家入黎交流

replies.msg:
最近小弟打算考政府工，開始上網搵下D exercise 黎做
Topic: What is your view on MTR's proposed fare increase?

Since the “Fare Adjustment Mechanism” has been launched for nine years, the issue of increasing fare price has been becoming a controversial topic to Hong Kong citizens. Some passengers suggest the MTR should freeze the fare price due to its large annual net profit. From my point of view, it is not appropriate for MTR to raise the price of fare.

To begin with, in aspect of public affordability, the consecutive increases in fare price may become a bigger burden on transportation fee to some Hong Kong people in the long term. According to the research of household income distribution in Hong Kong last year, the median income of Hong Kong people was about HKD $15000 and the average transportation fee was over HKD $2000, which was almost 15% of the median salary of Hong Kong workers. Therefore, if the fare price was increased by MTR continuously, the living quality of grass-roots may be seriously affected.

In addition, the fare fee should not be increased by MTR not only because of the concern on public affordability, but also because of the business image of the company. The latest annual report of the MTR has shown that the company’s net profit in 2018 was about 16.8 billion. Although the company has the right to adjust the fare fee within a reasonable range under this mechanism, this action may trigger the dissatisfaction in society in the future that may cause a negative impact to the company image in the long term.

Furthermore, the company should take their social responsibility to benefit the different groups that should include children, students, the elderly, and adults as well. Although MTR is a public traded company in Hong Kong and it should deem the shareholders’ benefits as its first priority at the company strategy, its railway network is benefited by the government policy that makes it have no opponent in the railway market since the MTR combined with Kowloon Canton Railway Corporation. Therefore, when the company has such a profit because it takes advantage of the government policy, it should provide more fare concessions instead of increasing the fare price only.

However, some senior management level at MTR company refuse to stop adding fare fee because they have already provided different measures to reduce their transportation burden, such as “Monthly” and “Day” pass. The part of annual profit is also used in improvement of service performance, including facility maintenance, purchase of new equipment and tools, and employment. Moreover, the inflation will also increase the operation cost of the company. Therefore, it is necessary to adjust the fare price in order to remedy the operation cost.

In my opinion, the company should not take inflation effect and improvement of service performance as an excuse to increase fare fee because the company can be able to improve the service quality without fare increase as the company earns a lot from the public. The company should have a capacity to afford the cost of upgrading their facility.

replies.msg: 要用番哂passive voice咁寫？

好快咁scan咗次，純講usage唔睇organisation, tone, content住

fare / fee / price 是但寫一個，唔會fare fee，fare price咁寫

not only but also 嗰句太冗長要simplify，就算keep都唔使寫兩次because of

can be able to meaning 重覆，一係able一係can

Not to be disrespectful, grammar問題唔大但collocations未夠好，寫得有少少生硬，其他睇到再講

its railway network is benefited by the government policy that makes it have no opponent in the railway market

如果你識monopoly呢個字，三兩隻字可以sum up晒呢句，... ... result(s) in / lead(s) to a monopolistic competition.

寫in the entire railway (transportation/engineering) industry會好啲

唔好咁易用make呢個字，唔係特定collocations, 例如decision呢類，會變得好Chinglish

replies.msg:
其實你d文筆已經好過好多所謂大學生
不過當然有再進步嘅空間
最主要係好似其他巴打咁講
有d句字可以精簡d
可以再俾多少少意見你參考

If the fare price was... the grass-roots may be...
用得was就應該後面要用might
不過你呢度應該用is + may好d
因為if 再加 was多數係講緊d冇乜可能發生嘅情况

That may cause a negative impact to the company image...
簡單d, that may damage company image就得

The median income of hong kong people was about $15000...
呢度雖然係人睇到都知講緊月薪 不過都最好加返monthly

Operation cost -> operating / operational cost
Cost前面唔好用noun

Can be able to improve -> can improve

請教巴打 平時點樣操寫文
好多時睇人地寫既文或者政府公告
都睇得明 隻隻字都識
但係就寫唔出人地咁既文筆
